translations.seo.title: Voxel
translations.seo.description: Voxel is a personal project, created with passion. The goal is to share my knowledge and help you develop your own content.

translations.payment.cancel.seo.description: A page that indicates that the payment has been canceled.
translations.payment.cancel.title: Payment canceled
translations.payment.cancel.description: Your payment has been canceled. If you need more information, You can contact us.

translations.payment.success.title: Payment successful
translations.payment.success.description: Your payment has been successful. If you need more information, You can contact us.
translations.tracker.title: Your privacy
translations.tracker.description: This site uses tracking technologies. You may opt in or opt out of the use of these technologies,
translations.tracker.privacy.description: This site uses tracking technologies. You may opt in or opt out of the use of these technologies, by clicking on the buttons below.
translations.tracker.necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
translations.tracker.necessary.description: Necessary cookies help make a website usable by enabling basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.
translations.tracker.analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
translations.tracker.analytics.description: Analytical cookies help us to improve our website by collecting and reporting information on its usage.
translations.tracker.marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
translations.tracker.marketing.description: Marketing cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third party advertisers.
translations.lost.title: Are you lost?
translations.lost.description: The page you're trying to access doesn't exist, or it might have been moved. If you think this is an error, don't hesitate to contact us!
translations.timeline.author: Author
translations.timeline.updates.title: New updates and improvements
translations.timeline.opengraph.title: Patch notes · Enchant Configurator · Voxel
translations.timeline.opengraph.description: The history of changes and updates made to the Enchant Configurator.
translations.soon.seo.title: Coming soon · Voxel
translations.soon.seo.description: This content is in development, it will arrive soon, come back soon!
translations.soon.title: Coming soon
translations.soon.description: Sorry, this is still in development! Come back soon, but hey - check out these pretty triangles in the meantime :3!
translations.contact.seo.title: Contact · Voxel
translations.contact.seo.description: Contact us for any question or collaboration request.
translations.contact.discord.name: Discord Community
translations.contact.discord.description: Join our Discord community to chat with us and other members - they're super friendly, I promise!
translations.contact.twitter.name: Twitter
translations.contact.twitter.description: Follow us on Twitter/X to stay in the loop with our latest announcements!
translations.contact.github.name: Github
translations.contact.github.description: Want to check out our projects on Github? Right this way!
translations.contact.mail.name: Mail
translations.contact.mail.description: Got any questions? Don't hesitate to reach out!
translations.contact.discord_mp.name: Discord - Private Message
translations.contact.discord_mp.description: Hey, I'm Hardel! Feel free to send me a DM on Discord - I can be a bit scatterbrained, but I try to reply to everyone :3
translations.home.feature.title: Made by a passionate dev for passionate players
translations.home.feature.description: Voxel is a personal project, created with passion. The goal is to share my knowledge and help you develop your own content.
translations.home.product.datapack.title: Datapacks
translations.home.product.datapack.description: Voxel is in content creation, like NeoEnchant or Yggdrasil
translations.home.product.resource.title: Resources
translations.home.product.resource.description: Level up your future creations with quality resources, made with passion.
translations.home.product.tools.title: Configuration Tools
translations.home.product.tools.description: Configure your content (Mods and Datapacks) with a simple and intuitive tool.
translations.home.resource.title: Free to use resources
translations.home.resource.description: We offer free and paid thematic packs to create content that is mods, datapacks, or anything else.
translations.home.datapack.title: Content for you to enjoy
translations.home.datapack.description: Voxel offers tons of fun content, with new enchantments, massive structures, and exclusive rewards - all perfectly balanced!
translations.home.wiki.title: Accompanied by a wiki
translations.home.wiki.description: The two main contents NeoEnchant and Yggdrasil come with their own pages. You'll find video showcases of all enchantments, and for Yggdrasil, the rewards from each structure!
translations.marketplace.seo.title: Marketplace · Voxel
translations.marketplace.seo.description: Use free and paid assets made by Voxel for your next project.
translations.marketplace.title: Marketplace
translations.marketplace.description: Find the best assets for your next project.
translations.marketplace.go: I want to see it now
translations.marketplace.success.download.title: What to do in case of loss in the future?
translations.marketplace.success.download.description: An email has been sent to the address you provided when you made the purchase with the download links. If you did not receive it, you can contact me.
You can also come back to this page to re-download the files.
Otherwise, you can connect to Stripe with the email you provided when you made the purchase to retrieve the files.
And as a last hope, you can use the code below to contact me.
translations.navbar.datapack.neoenchant.title: NeoEnchant+
translations.navbar.datapack.neoenchant.description: A data pack that adds 31 new original and balanced enchantments in vanilla.
translations.navbar.datapack.modrinth.title: Modrinth
translations.navbar.datapack.modrinth.description: Find all the data packs available on Modrinth
translations.navbar.datapack.yggdrasil.title: Yggdrasil
translations.navbar.resources.tool.enchant.title: Enchantment Tool
translations.navbar.resources.tool.enchant.descriptio: Take existing data packs and modify them with a simple and user-friendly interface
translations.navbar.resources.harmonization.title: Harmonization
translations.navbar.resources.harmonization.descripti: An tool to harmonize the colors of the textures
translations.navbar.resources.asset.title: Marketplace
translations.navbar.resources.asset.description: Free-Use assets to help you in your content creation
translations.navbar.resources.migration.title: Migration
translations.navbar.resources.sound.title: Soon
translations.navbar.resources.migration.description: Migrate your mod/datapack to a different version of Minecraft
translations.footer.description: VOXEL, what is it? These are guides in French, from beginner to advanced level, to learn how to develop mods or enrich your existing knowledge.
translations.blog.seo.title: Blog · Voxel
translations.blog.seo.description: Discover our latest news and updates.
translations.guides.title: The Guides
translations.guides.seo.title: Guides · Voxel
translations.guides.seo.description: Discover our latest guides and have fun.
translations.guides.discover: Discover our latest guides and have fun.
translations.guides.contains: This pack contains the guides for Forge, Fabric and NeoForge, exclusive resources, code examples and personalized support.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.seo.title: Neo Enchant+ · Voxel
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.seo.description: Neo Enchant is a datapack which introduces a new suite of enchantments. It is designed to be fun and balanced. Available on Modrinth and CurseForge. Try it now!
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.title: Neo Enchant+
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.description: Neo Enchant by Hardel. is a datapack which introduces a new suite of enchantments to the game. It is designed to be a balanced and fun addition to the game. Explore innovative ways to enhance your Minecraft experience.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.personalize.title: Personalize your experience
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.personalize.descrip: Discover our enchantment configurator and personalize your experience with our datapacks. Not only with NeoEnchant, but also with our other datapacks.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.explosive_a: The arrow will explode on impact, dealing damage to entities and destroying blocks, the shooter is immune to this explosion.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.accuracy_sh: The shot arrow will go straight to the target, ignoring gravity, after long delay, the arrow will disappear.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.breezing_ar: At impact, the arrow will create a gust of wind that pushes entities away from the impact point. If the arrow hits an entity, she'll be sent briefly into the air.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.echo_shot.d: The arrow has the power of the warden, it will explode on impact, inflicting damage to entities and not destroying blocks, the shooter is immune to this explosion.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.storm_arrow: When arrow hit block, or entity, he has a chance to summon a lightning bolt at the impact point, dealing damage to entities and setting fire to blocks.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.fury.title: Fury
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.fury.descri: Decrease armor but increase attack damage, add penetration to the attack.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.lifeplus.de: Increase the maximum health of the player, the player will have more hearts.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.venom_prote: Protects the player from poison, with superior level, the player will be immune to wither.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.timber.desc: When the player breaks a wood block, all the connected wood blocks will be broken.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.lava_walker: When the player walks on lava, the enchantment will create a block of magma under the player's feet, the player is also immune to lava and magma damage.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.step_assist: Increase the player's step height, the player can climb blocks more easily without jumping.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.builder_arm: The player can place blocks from more distance, the player can also break blocks from more distance.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.armored.des: Increase the player's armor, the player will take less damage.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.auto_feed.d: Every minute, the player automatically receives a few saturation points. It's not enough to be dependent on enchantment.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.bright_visi: The player has night vision, the player can see in the dark.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.voidless.de: The player is immune to the void, the player will got a brief levitation effect when he falls into the void.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.scyther.des: Use left click on grass to transform it into farmland in zone depending of level.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.dwarfed.des: The size of the entity is reduced.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.oversize.de: The size of the entity is increased.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.striker.des: When the player smash an entity with mace, have chance to create a lightning bolt at the impact point.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.wind_propul: When the player is on ground, he can attack the ground to propel himself in the air.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.bedrock_bre: The player can break bedrock, the player will need a pickaxe with this enchantment.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.spawner_tou: The player can break spawner and get it, work on trial spawner and normal spawner.
When the player breaks a block, all the connected minerals of the same type will be broken.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.fear.title: Fear
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.fear.descri: When the player hit a creeper, increment the timer of the creeper explosion.
When the player hit an entity, the player will recover some health.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.pull.title: Pull
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.pull.descri: Have chance, after kill an entity to get the spawn egg of the entity.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.reach.title: Reach
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.xp_boost.de: Increase the player's experience gain when killing entities.
When the player breaks a block, the block will be automatically smelted.
Break in a zone of 3x3, depending of the direction of the player.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.magical_wat: Magic, magic, what does this enchantment do ?
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.curse_of_en: The item can no longer be enchanted.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.curse_of_br: The item loses durability with each use with an increasing chance based on level.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.eternal_fro: Transforms the ground into ice and slows targets, creating ice spikes on impact.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.rebound.des: Arrows bounce off walls and apply their effects with each bounce.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.tears_of_as: Converts player experience into attack damage.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.teluric.des: Creates a seismic wave that launches targets into the air when sneaking.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.gugnir.desc: Transforms the ground into ice and slows targets, creating ice spikes on impact.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.last_hope.d: Consumes the item to deal infinite damage to the target.
translations.datapacks.neoenchant.enchant.sky_walk.de: Permet de flotter dans les airs, et de s'envoler en s'accroupissant.
translations.datapacks.beyondenchant.seo.title: Beyond Enchant · Voxel
translations.datapacks.beyondenchant.seo.description: A datapack which increases the maximum level of vanilla enchantments, Available on Modrinth and CurseForge. Try it now!
translations.datapacks.beyondenchant.title: Beyond Enchant
translations.datapacks.beyondenchant.description: Increase the maximum level of vanilla enchantments, and try out new gameplay mechanics.
translations.datapacks.yggdrasil.seo.title: Yggdrasil · Voxel
translations.datapacks.yggdrasil.seo.description: Explore massive structures, find secrets and explore the lore. Available on Modrinth and CurseForge. Try it now!
translations.datapacks.yggdrasil.title: Yggdrasil
translations.datapacks.yggdrasil.description: Explore structures of extreme difficulty, find secrets and obtain exclusive new enchantments.
translations.datapacks.better_furnace.seo.title: Better Furnace · Voxel
translations.datapacks.better_furnace.seo.description: A datapack which adds some new types of furnaces. Each furnace is faster, more efficient, and more difficult to obtain. Available on Modrinth and CurseForge. Try it now!
translations.datapacks.better_furnace.title: Better Furnace
translations.datapacks.better_furnace.description: Adds new types of furnaces, faster, more efficient, and harder to obtain.
translations.tools.harmonization.seo.title: Image harmonization · Voxel
translations.tools.harmonization.seo.description: Harmonize the colors of an image by reducing the color palette
translations.tools.harmonization.title: Harmonization
translations.tools.harmonization.description: This tool allows you to harmonize a texture by extracting its colors and quantifying the image to reduce the palette.
translations.tools.harmonization.small: For example, you can use this tool to improve the result of a texture generated by a generative model.
translations.tools.harmonization.drop: Drop your image here or click to select
translations.tools.migration.seo.title: Datapack Migration · Voxel
translations.tools.migration.seo.description: Migrate your mods or datapacks, modified by the configurator, to a different version, while keeping your modifications active.
translations.tools.migration.home.description: Migrate your mods or datapacks, modified by the configurator, to a different version, while keeping your modifications active.
translations.tools.migration.source: Your datapack customized by the configurator
translations.tools.migration.target: The datapack you want to update
translations.tools.migration.drop.source: Drop your datapack customized by the configurator in this box
translations.tools.migration.drop.target: Drop the datapack you want to update in this box
translations.tools.migration.error.invalid_datapack: This content is not a datapack modified by the configurator
translations.tools.migration.success.additional_info: Quick tip: You can rename any mod or datapack - it won't affect anything!
translations.tools.migration.description: This tool lets you migrate from a datapack/mod you've customized with the configurator to another version of the same project, keeping your modifications active on the latest version.
translations.tools.migration.description.list.1: You can migrate to any version, whether it's new or old.
translations.tools.migration.description.list.2: You can migrate from a datapack to mods, or vice versa.
translations.tools.migration.description.list.3: It works with any mods or datapack.
translations.tools.migration.description.title: Explore our datapacks
translations.tools.migration.description.description: On Modrinth, find all our datapacks, like NeoEnchant which adds enchantments, Yggdrasil which adds a nordic story with tons of structures!
translations.tools.migration.step1.title: Drop your datapack modified by the configurator
translations.tools.migration.step1.description: Drop the datapack you modified with the configurator here, it'll be automatically analyzed and migrated.
translations.tools.migration.step2.title: Drop the datapack you want to update
translations.tools.migration.step2.description: Drop the datapack you want to migrate to here, and the configuration will be automatically applied from the pack you dropped on the left.
translations.tools.migration.step3.title: Migration complete
translations.tools.migration.step3.description: Once the migration is complete, the datapack will automatically download in your browser
translations.tools.enchantments.seo.title: Enchantment configurator · Voxel
translations.tools.enchantments.seo.description: Configure enchantments of a mods and or a datapack with a simple and intuitive interface
translations.tools.sound.seo.title: Mojang sound · Voxel
translations.tools.sound.seo.description: This tool allows you to listen to the sounds of Minecraft, very useful for mod and datapack creators to find the right sounds to use.
translations.tools.studio.seo.title: Voxel Studio
translations.tools.studio.seo.description: This feature is under development, come back later for more information.
